granny square tote crochet pattern **purpose/function ** a downloadable pdf pattern that guides you step-by-step to create a traditional fashionable tote bag this pattern is perfect for personal use or creating handmade gifts for friends and family **target audience ** suitable for beginners and experienced crocheters who enjoy making granny square projects **features and benefits** **features ** clear step-by-step written instructions with stitch abbreviations high-resolution photos for key steps to guide visual learners yarn and hook recommendations for optimal results **benefits ** easy-to-follow instructions save time and reduce frustration gain confidence in working with joining methods create a versatile and fashionable accessory that s perfect for gifting or selling **technical information** **file format ** pdf format delivered in uk terms **file size ** approximately 11 mb **device/software compatibility ** compatible with devices supporting pdf readers such as adobe acrobat on smartphones tablets and computers **internet requirements ** an internet connection is needed for downloading the file after purchase **usage instructions** **how to download and prerequisites** **usage instructions** complete your purchase on etsy ravelry or shopify download the pdf file from the confirmation email or your account s download section open the file on any pdf-compatible device and follow the pattern instructions **prerequisites ** basic crochet knowledge including how to work single_crochet single_crochet and double_crochet double_crochet stitches other required skills listed above required tools crochet hook 5mm yarn scissors stitch markers and a yarn needle **safety and compliance** **compliance ** this pattern complies with the general product safety regulation gpsr **precautions ** not suitable for children under 16 without adult supervision ensure your device can open pdf files before purchase **disclaimer ** this product is for educational and personal use only **customer support** if you have any questions or encounter issues with the pattern please contact us at help@bellacococrochet com support hours monday friday 9 am 4 pm gmt response time within 48 hours **refund policy** due to the nature of digital downloads refunds or exchanges are not available please review all product details before purchase **licensing and permissions** licensing terms this pattern is for
